contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox flag | Name = | Nickname = Flag of the Cayman Islands | Image = Flag of the Cayman Islands.svg | Use = 110010 | Proportion = 1:2 | Adoption = 14 May 1958 | Design = Blue ensign with the [[coat of arms of the Cayman Islands|coat-of-arms of the Cayman Islands]] in the fly. |}} The '''Flag of the [[Cayman Islands]]''' was adopted on 14 May 1958 after the colony was officially granted a [[coat of arms of the Cayman Islands|coat-of-arms]]. Prior to that, the Islands had used the [[Flag of the United Kingdom|British flag]] for all official occasions. In 1999, the white disc was removed and the arms were more than doubled in size, although the pre-1999 flag remains popular and is still used on some official occasions, and the Cayman Islands Government website describes the flag as a "British blue ensign with the arms on a white disc in the fly." During the [[2004 Summer Olympics|2004]], [[2008 Summer Olympics|2008]] and [[2012 Summer Olympics]], and during the [[Vancouver 2010|2010 Winter olympics]], the Cayman Islands team marched in under the flag as described on the government website. Common with most [[British overseas territories]], the [[Governors of the Cayman Islands|Governor]]'s flag is a Union Flag defaced with the coat-of-arms. The governor's flag was also changed in 1999, the arms were made bigger and a golden ring was added. ==Gallery== <center> {{Begin flag gallery}} {{Flag entry|Width=200|Image=Civil_Ensign_of_the_Cayman_Islands.svg|Caption=[[File:FIAV 000100.svg|23px]] Civil ensign 1999-present}} {{Flag entry|Width=200|Image=Flag of the Governor of the Cayman Islands.svg|Caption=[[File:IFIS Normal.svg|23px]]Flag of the [[Governor of the Cayman Islands]]}} {{New flag row}} {{Flag entry|Width=200|Image=Flag of the Cayman Islands (pre-1999).svg|Caption=[[File:IFIS Historical.svg|23px]] [[File:FIAV 110010.svg|23px]] Flag of the Cayman Islands, 1958-1999}} {{Flag entry|Width=200|Image=Civil Ensign of the Cayman Islands (pre-1999).svg|Caption=[[File:FIAV 000100.svg|23px]] Civil ensign 1958-1999}} {{End flag gallery}} </center> ==See also== * [[List of flags of the United Kingdom]] ==References== * [http://www.gov.ky/portal/page?_pageid=1142,1481118&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL The Cayman Islands Flag] {{British dependencies flags}} {{Flags of North America}} {{Union Flag}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cayman Islands, Flag of the}} [[Category:Caymanian culture|Flag]] [[Category:National flags]] [[Category:Blue Ensigns]] [[Category:Flags of British Overseas Territories]] [[Category:1958 introductions]] {{Caribbean-flag-stub}} {{Caymans-stub}}
